mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bus(departure, arrival, depart_time, arrive_time, type, company) VALUES ( #{departure}, #{arrival}, #{depart_time}, #{arrive_time}, #{type}, #{company} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Bus SET departure = #{departure}, arrival = #{arrival}, depart_time = #{depart_time}, arrive_time = #{arrive_time}, type = #{type}, company = #{company} WHERE id = #{id}
